The girl in the middle is wearing a white shirt and plaid skirt, holding a large plastic bottle filled with purple liquid. The girl on the right is wearing a yellow top and red pants, holding a large plastic bottle filled with yellow liquid. In the middle of the screen, there are white subtitles on a red background.
